author: chenpei
msg: The import of the smoking staus type system had a lower case s.
but, the name defined in the the smoking status type system has an uppercase s.
Keeping it consistent in trunk and going forward.
(Not sure why we needed 2 copies of the desc- could be how the resources are loaded up from the annotators.)

author: mona
msg: OOZIE-1135 Display missing partition dependencies via job -info command on CLI (mona)

author: jleroux
msg: I tried to use the non useLog4J branch and localised it to show more like how useLog4J renders. But I found some issues with (time was not in sync useLog4J when I used both) and finally did not use it. So it's only the l10n part
I also added a convenient get()
